meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of pederasty
meanings.sent1: The pederastic relationship between the two characters was frowned upon by society.
meanings.sent2: The artist's pederastic artwork depicted scenes from ancient Greece.
meanings.sent3: The pederastic joke at the party made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His pederastic style of painting was both controversial and thought-provoking.
meanings.sent5: The pederastic nature of the story left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.definition: involving or relating to sexual activity between an adult male and a young boy
meanings.sent1: The pederastic behavior of the teacher towards his student was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: The community was shocked to discover the pederastic activities happening in their neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The pederastic mix-up in the play added a comedic twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: The pederastic undertones in the movie were disturbing yet thought-provoking.
meanings.sent5: The pederastic scandal rocked the small town to its core.
